# Source Language
English

# Target Language
Chinese

# Target Fragment
coastal village

# Target Sentence
They settled in a small coastal village near the bay

# Context
The sea was calm that summer. <sentence>They settled in a small <fragment>coastal village</fragment> near the bay</sentence> Fishing boats left at dawn and returned at dusk.
{"translation":"海边村庄","sentence_translation":"他们在海湾附近的一个海边村庄定居下来"}

# Source Language

subtle glow

# Context

{"translation":"微弱的光芒","sentence_translation":"黎明前地平线上出现了一道微弱的光芒"}

# Source Language
English

Chinese

paused mid-sentence

# Target Sentence
He paused mid-sentence when the door creaked open

# Context
The meeting room was silent. <sentence>He <fragment>paused mid-sentence</fragment> when the door creaked open</sentence> Everyone turned to see who had arrived.
{"translation":"说到一半停顿","sentence_translation":"当门吱呀一声被推开时，他说到一半停顿了"}
